{{also|durst}} ==German== ===Etymology=== {{PIE root|de|ters}} From {{inh|de|gmh|durst}}, from {{inh|de|goh|durst}}, {{m|goh|thurst}}, from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} {{m|gem-pro|*þurstuz}}, from {{etyl|ine-pro|de}} {{m|ine-pro|*ters-||dry}}. Akin to {{cog|odt|thursti}} (modern {{cog|nl|dorst}}), {{cog|osx|thurst}}, {{cog|ang|þurst}} (modern {{cog|en|thirst}}). ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/dʊʁst/|[dʊʁst]|[dʊɐ̯st]}} * {{audio|de|De-Durst.ogg|Audio}} * {{hyphenation|de|Durst}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Durstes|gen2=Dursts|-}} # [[thirst]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|n=sg}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|dürsten}} * {{l|de|durstig}} * {{l|de|Durststrecke}} * {{l|de|Nachdurst}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
